issue.title: [Python] Attach proper tzinfo when computing boxed scalars for TimestampArray
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-669](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-669). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Currently, the returned datetime.datetime/pandas.Timestamp objects are always tz-naive

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-669?focusedCommentId=15954389) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
This is included in the patch for ARROW-668: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/487

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-669?focusedCommentId=15957726) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Resolved by PR https://github.com/apache/arrow/commit/e29a7d4cae943312a1f8598e71c5d46c1954b5fa
